description: This file defines an interface for user settings management within the WPEFramework. It includes mechanisms for registering notifications and setting/getting various user preferences such as audio description, language preferences, captions, caption services, and privacy modes. The interface also supports notification callbacks for changes in these settings.

classes.name: IUserSettings
classes.description: An interface for managing user settings, supporting registration of notifications, and access to settings related to audio descriptions, languages, captions, closed caption services, and privacy modes.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback for user setting changes.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification callback.

methods.name: SetAudioDescription
methods.description: Enables or disables the audio description feature.

methods.name: GetAudioDescription
methods.description: Retrieves whether the audio description feature is enabled.

methods.name: SetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Sets the preferred audio languages as a comma-separated list of ISO 639-2/B codes.

methods.name: GetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Gets the current preferred audio languages setting.

methods.name: SetPresentationLanguage
methods.description: Sets the presentation language in BCP 47 format.

methods.name: GetPresentationLanguage
methods.description: Gets the current presentation language setting.

methods.name: GetPreferredCaptionsLanguages
methods.description: Gets the current preferred captions languages.

methods.name: SetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Sets the preferred closed captioning service.

methods.name: GetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Gets the current preferred closed captioning service.

methods.name: SetPrivacyMode
methods.description: Sets the privacy mode (e.g., share or do not share).

methods.name: GetPrivacyMode
methods.description: Retrieves the current privacy mode setting.

notifications.name: INotification
notifications.description: Notification interface for user setting changes, including audio description, language, captions, closed captioning, and privacy mode updates.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
